payload.title: React 17â†’18 migration: ReactDOM.render to createRoot
payload.description: Replace ReactDOM.render with createRoot(...).render for React 18.
payload.patch:
--- a/src/main.jsx
+++ b/src/main.jsx
@@
-import ReactDOM from 'react-dom'
-ReactDOM.render(<App />, document.getElementById('root'))
+import { createRoot } from 'react-dom/client'
+const root = createRoot(document.getElementById('root'))
+root.render(<App />)
